def reverse(val):
    sum=0
    last=True
    copy=val
    while copy!=0:
        if copy%10==0 and last==True:
            copy=copy/10
            continue
        last=False
        sum=sum*10
        sum=sum+copy%10
        copy=copy/10
    if sum==val:
        return True
    else:
        return False
def main():
    t=0
    t=int(raw_input())
    while t!=0 :
        k=0
        k=int(raw_input())
        for i in range(k+1,100000):
            if reverse(i):
                print i
                break
        t=t-1
main()
